title: Zionodes
author: Zionodes
content: For the first time, Zionodes is offering Aleo Servers to lease.Â The profit potential for early adopters is enormous, especially given that the network is less congested now than it will be after the mainnet launch in the near future. It is also worth noting that it has already attracted major investors, raising over $298M, surpassing FIL's $258M, making it the most anticipated launch for investors.To know more, visit:Website: https://aleo.zionodes.com/Telegram: https://t.me/+VChfYBDutaAMRiAoDiscord: https://discord.com/invite/jzcgjjwZ2KMedium Announcement: https://zionodesoc.medium.com/zionodes-welcomes-the-future-with-privacy-joins-the-hybrid-aleo-protocol-for-provers-and-650155da4448

comments.author: asic19
comments.body: That's great news man. I can already see that you guys have grown a lot since my last purchase and sale. I have been looking for Aleo Mining options online for over a week now, but could not find anyone trusworthy. I want to start onboarding soon, so I will reach out to one of your representatives soon via telegram (Alex). Please respond to a few of my queries before I can start mining with you guys. I don't want to wait too long cause I know how time is a bit of a factor here with the mainnet launch nearing. See you on telegram guys!

comments.author: Zionodes
comments.body: Quote from: asic19 on December 19, 2022, 01:05:02 PMThat's great news man. I can already see that you guys have grown a lot since my last purchase and sale. I have been looking for Aleo Mining options online for over a week now, but could not find anyone trusworthy. I want to start onboarding soon, so I will reach out to one of your representatives soon via telegram (Alex). Please respond to a few of my queries before I can start mining with you guys. I don't want to wait too long cause I know how time is a bit of a factor here with the mainnet launch nearing. See you on telegram guys! Thank you! Feel free to reach out
